lead_paragraph: Two Rangers and three Devils are among the selections for the Olympic team, which has an average age of 26.
snippet: Two Rangers and three Devils are among the selections for the Olympic team, which has an average age of 26.

headline.main: U.S. Opts for Younger Players Over Veterans for Olympic Team
headline.seo: U.S. Opts for Younger Players Over Veterans for Olympic Team
headline.print_headline: For the United States, a Younger and Speedier Olympic Squad
